articles.title: Bette Nash: World's longest-serving flight attendant dies at 88 - BBC.com
articles.description: Bette Nash began working with the forerunner of American Airlines in 1957 and never retired from the job.
articles.content:
Bette Nash, the world's longest-serving flight attendant, has died aged 88 after nearly 70 years of airborne service.

articles.title: Google is playing whack-a-mole with disastrous AI Overviews gone viral - Android Authority
articles.description: Google is manually tweaking disastrous AI Overviews after several went viral for being wildly incorrect or outright dangerous.
articles.content:
• Google has confirmed that it will take swift action on erroneous AI Overviews.
  • The statement comes after several incorrect, weird, or dangerous AI Overviews went viral online.
